response.original_title: City of Champions: The Best of Boston Sports
response.overview: CITY OF CHAMPIONS is the most exciting and comprehensive Boston sports film ever created! NEVER before has one film  captured the energy and passion of so many epic sports moments from the Red Sox, Patriots, Celtics, Bruins, college, USA Hockey, Beanpot, Marathon, boxing, and more.  Relive hundreds of the most riveting and emotional plays, live calls, press conferences, retirement speeches, and interviews set to a heart-pounding soundtrack by Aerosmith, AC/DC, the Boston Pops, Pearl Jam, Creed, Train, Five for Fighting, Crossfade, The Isley Brothers, Pete Yorn, and more!  Get ready for a breathtaking ride through the ups and downs, the heartaches and all the glory of Boston sports. Relive Havilcek's steal, Flutie's pass, Orr's flying goal, the 2004 World Series Championship, and of course, Boone, Buckner, and Dent.
response.title: City of Champions: The Best of Boston Sports
